description:
Rear of 4 - 11 Lonsdale Place

(T1) Sycamore - Reduce the crown of the tree by up to 3 metres and back to the most recent points of reduction.
(T2) London Plane - Reduce the crown of the tree by up to 3 metres and back to the most recent points of reduction.
(T3) London Plane - Reduce the crown of the tree by up to 3 metres and back to the most recent points of reduction.
(T4) Cherry - reduce the East side of the crown by up to 2 metres in order to balance the crown.

Front of 4-11 Lonsdale Place

(T5) Whitebeam - reduce the East side crown of the tree by up to 2 metres and to clear the property reduce the remaining crown (max 1.5m) to balance as required. Thin crown by up to 20%.
(T6) Whitebeam - reduce the East side crown of the tree by up to 2 metres and to clear the property reduce the remaining crown (max 1.5m) to balance as required. Thin crown by up to 20%.
(T7) Norway Maple, Crimson King T7 - reduce the East side crown of the tree by up to 2 metres and to clear the property reduce the remaining crown (max 1.5m) to balance as required. Thin crown by up to 20%.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
